content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0.5, 6.0)
Consists of boiler (position 0.5, 6.0) and steam engine (position 0.5, 0.5). This structure is intended to generate electricity using steam produced from water heated by the boiler.

### Copper plate factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 47.0, -82.0) and stone furnace (position -5.0, -65.0)
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-84.5) that connects the furnace to the output.

### Wooden chests
Multiple wooden chests are present at the following positions:
- Position (46.5, -83.5)
- Position (48.5, -83.5)
- Position (5.5, -79.5)
- Position (10.5, -79.5)
- Position (-4.5, -63.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting Boiler and Steam Engine
- Not enough pipes to connect Boiler and Steam Engine. Ensure you have sufficient pipes in your inventory before attempting to connect these entities.

### Errors when placing Offshore Pump
- Cannot place Offshore Pump as it is not in inventory. Make sure to have the Offshore Pump in your inventory before trying to place it.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Ensure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
